title: Online Learning Material Development: Science Education Design Through Blended Approaches

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital device literacy and intermediate scientific expertise
context.additional_context: Science job training for managers conducted in a restricted technological environment centered on smartphones

learning_goals: Learners can design online science learning content optimized for mobile environments
Learners can develop interactive eLearning materials based on formative assessment
Learners can apply methods to effectively convey scientific concepts using visual aids (infographics, video clips)

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
